ComicInfo.Title: I Fought the Colossus!; The Hidden Martians; Earth Will Be Destroyed!; He Never Reached the Ground!
ComicInfo.Summary:
I Fought the Colossus!: An advanced supercomputer turns Earth into a utopia, but suspicion remains, only to be inflamed when it is found to be building a giant robot. Humanity turns on the computer and destroys the robot, only to find that it was intended to replace the supercomputer, which breaks down, leaving humanity without its intelligence.
The Hidden Martians: A man charged with detecting hidden Martians is unaware that his girlfriend is one of them.
Earth Will Be Destroyed!: Aliens plot to devastate Earth before invading, but they cannot pinpoint its location. They are unaware that they are on Earth as a speck of dust in a petri dish, which is casually discarded.
He Never Reached the Ground!: A man falls 35 floors but disappears at ground level just before impact, saved by a Tibetan mystic indebted to his great-grandfather.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Kirby,Dick Ayers,Steve Ditko,Alfonso Greene,Jack Kirby,Dick Ayers,Steve Ditko,Alfonso Greene
